welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bishops Stortford, a charming and picturesque town in the United Kingdom! Known for its historic architecture and beautiful parks, we invite you to explore and experience all that our town has to offer. Enjoy your stay in Bishops Stortford!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Stansted Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration and have time limits.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and charter flights at Wethersfield Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cambridge Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Southend Airport serves mainly low-cost airlines.
